content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 0(10), Milan 0(9).
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 0, Milan 0.
Substitution, Milan. Alessandro Matri replaces Philippe Mexes.
Attempt missed. Denis Cheryshev (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right.
Offside, Milan. Keisuke Honda tries a through ball, but Carlos Bacca is caught offside.

Foul by Keisuke Honda (Milan).
James Rodríguez (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Penalty Shootout ends, Real Madrid 0(10), Milan 0(9).
Penalty saved! Gianluigi Donnarumma (Milan) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the top centre of the goal.
Goal!  Real Madrid 0(10), Milan 0(9). Kiko Casilla (Real Madrid) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  Real Madrid 0(9), Milan 0(9). Gabriel Paletta (Milan) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Real Madrid 0(9), Milan 0(8). Jesé (Real Madrid) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
